items.name: Roleplaying Information
entries: Vaasha is a skilled hunter and tracker who doesn't charge into danger without first assessing the risks. She's not afraid to speak her mind, even to her king. To her, a worthy leader values the truth, no matter how painful it is.
Ideal: "I want this conflict over with so that I can return to the quiet stillness of the ocean depths."
Bond: "I'll protect this beautiful world from the ravages of evil with my dying breath."
Flaw: "I don't care if my words hurt others' feelings."
